trans-unit.source: TYPO3 Version:Include TYPO3 version in output
PHP Version: Include PHP version in output
Extension List:Include list of TYPO3 extensions and their version numbers in output
Loaded Extensions Only:Limit list of TYPO3 extensions to activated extensions only (not recommended)
Deprecation Log:Include status of deprecation log in output
Database Details:Include database details such as host and database name in output
Application Context:Include application context (e.g. production or development)
Timestamp:Include current timestamp and timezone (server settings) in output
Disk Usage:Include the size of current disk usage (available on UNIX/Linux systems only)
Site Name:Include TYPO3 site name in output
Server Name: Include server name or HTTP host name in output
Supress Header:Supress header line (TYPO3 Nagios(R) Extension and version) in output

Nagios(R) servers:Comma separated list of IP addresses or hostnames of Nagios(R) servers allowed to retrieve information about this TYPO3 instance (specify the IP address/hostname of the Nagios server - and the Nagios server ONLY)
TYPO3 Behind Proxy Server:Take IP address forwarded by proxy servers in HTTP header into account (not recommended)
